text: Alan Leslie Lerwill (15 November 1946 - 6 February 2021) was a British international long jumper. He competed in the 1968 Summer Olympics and in the 1972 Summer Olympics. He represented England and won a bronze medal in the 1970 British Commonwealth Games long jump, and gold medal in the 1974 British Commonwealth Games. Lerwill died on 6 February 2021, aged 74.Alan Lerwill: 1946-2021 ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British long jumpers Category:Olympians for Great Britain Category:People from Portsmouth
title: Alan Lerwill
